name: Florida Man Saves the World
description:
THE WORLD WAS DESTINED TO FALL TO CHAOS AT THE HANDS OF THE COVID-19 VIRUS. 

THERE IS ONLY ONE HOPE FOR SALVATION. 

PLAY AS THE LEGENDARY FLORIDA MAN AS YOU FOLLOW THE TRAIL BACK TO THE COVID HOMEWORLD IN ORDER TO ERADICATE THE GLOBAL PANDEMIC AND SAVE THE WORLD
